headline: Is Natural Gas Transmission Integration Shifting Cummins' (CMI) Long-Term Role in Sustainable Trucking?
summary: Earlier this month, Allison Transmission announced the successful integration of its 4500 Rugged Duty Series fully automatic transmission with the Cummins X15N natural gas engine in Kenworth T880 tractors, a pairing that was deployed by Ozinga Renewable Energy Logistics to advance sustainable heavy-duty transportation. This collaboration highlights how Cummins is meeting industry demand for cleaner energy solutions while enabling fleets to maintain operational performance standards. We'll...
